main.name: Pascu
main.bio: Hi there! âœ‹ I'm Jose Chavarria (Pascu), Full Stack Developer with Frontend orientation. Having participated in individual and group projects, I was able to learn working methodologies in development teams. In these projects I used tools such as React, Redux, Node, Express, SQL, HTML, Sass, perfecting myself with Javascript. Passionate about technology and the solutions they provide to everyday life. I worked more than 10 years in accounting and supply areas, in this process I acquired new learning routes and ways to solve the problems that arise.

work.title: Frontend Developer
work.description: Development of accommodation booking app. It was carried out in four weeks with a team of 8 developers (divided into frontend and backend) following the SCRUM methodology, presenting progress to the Product Owner every week.

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description: SPA development in which all the knowledge acquired in the FullStack Bootcamp was integrated. For this app, technologies such as React, Redux, pure HTML and CSS were used for the frontend and NodeJS, Express, Sequelize for the backend.

testimonials.text: Sonny is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Sonny has been AWESOME, he makes learning React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
